user.title: Add OVAPI Stop
user.description: Choose how to add your public transport stop

search.title: Search for Stop
search.description:
Enter a stop name or location to search.

If your stop isn't found but works at v0.ovapi.nl, you can contribute it:
• Add to custom_stops.json (see GitHub CONTRIBUTING.md)
• Or open a GitHub issue
• Or use Manual Entry with the stop code

select_stop.title: Select Stop
select_stop.description: Choose your stop from the results

configure.title: Configure Stop {stop_code}
configure.description: Configure monitoring options for this stop

data.walking_time: Walking Time to Stop (0 = disabled, 1-60 minutes)

data_description.walking_time: Set to 0 to disable the walking planner sensor. When enabled (1-60), creates a sensor that tells you when to leave.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to OVAPI. Please check the stop code.
error.no_stops_found: No stops found. If your stop works at v0.ovapi.nl but isn't searchable, you can contribute it via GitHub (see description above) or use Manual Entry with the stop code.
